interpretation:
The "flag: San Marino" card represents a strong sense of sovereignty and tradition. This emoji symbolizes a country that has maintained its independence and autonomy for centuries. It reflects the idea of freedom and self-determination, where individuals have the power to make their own choices and live according to their own values.

In a tarot reading, this card can indicate that the querent is seeking greater independence and self-expression. It may also suggest that they have a strong desire to uphold their own traditions and beliefs, even if they may be different from the mainstream.

On the other hand, this card can also serve as a warning against becoming too rigid or dogmatic in one's thinking. The querent may need to be more open to new ideas and perspectives in order to grow and evolve.

Overall, the "flag: San Marino" card is a powerful symbol of sovereignty, tradition, and freedom. It encourages the querent to embrace their own unique identity and stand up for what they believe in.
